Below is an instruction that describes a task. Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

### Instruction:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company

### Response:

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. It is with a heavy heart that I must inform you of my decision to resign from my position at [Company]. After much thought and consideration, I have decided that it is time for me to move on to new opportunities. 

My last day of work will be [last working date], and I will ensure that all my tasks are completed before leaving the company. Please let me know if there's anything else I can do to help facilitate a smooth transition during this period.

I want to thank you for the opportunities, support, and guidance you have provided throughout my time at [Company]. It has been an incredible experience working with such a great team, and I will always cherish the memories made here. 

Once again, please accept my sincerest apologies for any inconvenience this may cause to the company's operations. Thank you for everything, and I wish [Company] continued success in all its future endeavors.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
